dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for scene depth completion, consisting of projected LiDAR point clouds. The dataset includes 86,000 training images, 7,000 validation images, and 1,000 test images, with a significant portion of pixels missing.
dcterms:title: KITTI depth benchmark
